title: BCC: Quality not quantity is key to apprenticeship success (The British Chambers of Commerce)
text: ( Source : The British Chambers of Commerce ) Dr Adam Marshall responds to Ofsted 's stark report on the state of apprenticeships in the UK. Responding to Ofsted's stark report on the state of apprenticeships in the UK, Dr Adam Marshall,
